entry.title: Sunday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 7.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h near noon. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 23 this morning and minus 14 this afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Sunday 05 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Clearing. Low minus 21.
entry.summary: Clearing this evening. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 21. Wind chill minus 14 this evening and minus 30 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Sunday 05 March 2023
